title: Water containers and fixed or stationary cooking appliances
fullText:
A switchboard shall not be installed above open water containers, or fixed or stationary cooking appliances unless installed in a cupboard in accordance with Clause 4.6.4.2.
NOTE See Clause 4.6.5.2 for baths and showers.
Exception: A switchboard may be located in an area that may be affected by splashing water or by steam, provided that the switchboard is installed within an enclosure of IP33 rating or is installed in a cupboard with close-fitting doors.
